(Sorry I took so long to post.)

Hysteria:

Hysteria bangs on the console a few times and the blueprints are replaced 
with a fuzzy image of the battle around the Ark just as Prowl crashes into 
Killfest:

"Commander! It's fuzzy, but this is probably the best we're gonna get."

Hysteria played around with a few more keys, and the image zoomed out, 
becoming considerable clearer:

"There!"
